error.phone_required: Phone cannot be blank (required for Help & Support)
error.account_blocked_minutes: Your account is blocked. Please retry after {nMins} minute(s)
error.account_blocked_seconds: Your account is blocked. Please retry after {nSecs} second(s)

label.reset_password_send_email: If your email address matches the one we have on record, we will send a password reset message
label.submit_data_title: Use the link below to transmit data files directly to the Alythex encrypted Box account
label.submit_data_footer: Encrypted in transit using high-strength TLS encryption. Content encrypted at rest by Box using 256-bit AES encryption, and is further protected by a key-wrapping strategy utilising 256-bit AES encryption
